Name: Carta Switchel
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Complex and very refreshing. Rum is the predominant flavour but is brilliantly accentuated with grapefruit, fernet and vinegar.
History: Adapted from the British Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail created by Iain Griffiths at Dandelyan, London> Originally based on Bacardí Carta Blanca rum and Bacardí Carta Oro .
Nutrition: One serving of Carta Switchel contains 201 calories
Garnish: Mint sprig bouquet & grapefruit zest twist
